channel.title: Oh, just me again
channel.description: ..the problemchild xD How do i change the starting outfit ? and how do i edit shops (the items in it ) ?

item.title: Oh, just me again
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

starting outfit:

go into player.java and scroll or search to the part that says

playerEquipment[playerHat]=?; playerEquipment[playerCape]=?; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=?; playerEquipment[playerChest]=?; playerEquipment[playerShield]=?; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=?; playerEquipment[playerHands]=?; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=?; playerEquipment[playerRing]=?; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=?; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]

then replace the “?” with the item code you want to have.

Shops edit:

go into shops.cfg and find the name of the shop that you want to edit.
then add or replace the item codes and amounts to what you want them to be. (make sure you put the item codes in the item spot and amount in the amount spot.)
should look something like this:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 31 santa's_holiday_stuff 2 2 7336 1 7462 1 3105 1 1050 1 1038 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1037 1 1057 1 1055 1 1053 1 1961 1 1959 1 6858 1 6860 1 6862 1 6856 1 6859 1 6861 1 6863 1 6857 1 4084 100 shop = 32 The_dark_mage_robe_shop 2 1 3385 10 3387 10 3389 10 3391 10 3393 10 4089 10 4091 10 4093 10 4095 10 4097 10 4099 10 4101 10 4103 10 4105 10 4107 10 4109 10 4111 10 4113 10 4115 1 4117 10 6916 10 6918 10 6920 10 6922 10 6924 10 1437 500000 1438 5

Read full topic
